line_1: A bone, a mouldy morsel, or a nail:
line_2: Exhibits all their trumpery to sale,
'And that they well deserve a Jail,

line_1: 'For how cou'd one poor single Nail
line_2: 'Yet all my Strength wou'd not avail,

line_1: But mine has no taste for a ten-penny nail.
line_2: With submission I speak to your rev'rence's tail;

line_1: All tortur'd by choice with th' invisible nail.
line_2: All labour alike to illustrate my tale;

line_1: He sat him felly down and gnaw'd his bitter Nail.
line_2: Inrag'd at first, he scorn'd so weak a Jail,

line_1: He sat him felly down and gnaw'd his bitter Nail.
